Class Gui

java.lang.Object
observer.ViewObservable
view.gui.Gui

View
public class Gui extends ViewObservable implements View
Graphical interface (GUI) for the game.

    • showTurn

      public void showTurn(String player, Board gameBoard, Library playerLibrary, ArrayList<ObjectCard> playerObjInHand, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints, String firstPlayerToEnd, String playerNickname)
      Resets the turn.
      Specified by:
      showTurn in interface View
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      gameBoard - is the board of the game.
      playerLibrary - is the player's library.
      playerObjInHand - are the objects the player currently has in hand.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array of points for each completed common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array of available points for each common objective.
      firstPlayerToEnd - is the string containing the nickname of the first player to finish.
      playerNickname - is the string containing the nickname of the player .

    • showCommonObjectives

      Specified by:
      showCommonObjectives in interface View
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      commonObjective1 - is the first common objective.
      commonObjective2 - is the second common objective.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array of points for each completed common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array of available points for each common objective.
